title: lag spikes in the game
body:
hello,

recently i started having lags in my games. it's continuing the past 2 months. i dont know why but after 7-15~ mins of the game lags starts and ms goes up to 200-300 and it goes throug all the game. before 1 year i was playing on same computer and had no lags. before like 5months when i was playing at my other home(i'm student) i also had no lags, but when i came back to my families home i started having this lag. most of my games are unplayable now. it's irritating. looking for sollution.

replies.body: It could be a result of packet loss since it's been going on for about 2 months! Would suggest you grab those logs with our [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/226121307) to see what's going on and from there you can submit them over to our tech team in a [ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
